mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.title, IFNULL(commentinfo.comment_num,0) comment_num FROM topicinfo t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.topic_id, count(*) comment_num FROM comment c WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= c.comment_create GROUP BY c.topic_id ) commentinfo ON commentinfo.topic_id = t.id WHERE comment_num != 0 ORDER BY commentinfo.comment_num DESC limit 0,10

SELECT t.id, t.title, t.topic_create, t.view_count, t.is_good, IFNULL(commentinfo.comment_num, 0) comment_num FROM topicinfo t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.topic_id, count(*) comment_num FROM `comment` c GROUP BY c.topic_id ) commentinfo ON commentinfo.topic_id = t.id WHERE t.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by t.topic_create desc

SELECT t.id, t.title, t.topic_create, t.experience, t.is_end, t.is_good, t.is_top, t.user_id, u.avatar_url, u.`name`, u.role, c.catename, k.kindname, IFNULL(commentinfo.comment_num, 0) comment_num FROM topicinfo t LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.account_id = t.user_id LEFT JOIN category c ON c.id = t.category_id LEFT JOIN kind k ON k.id = t.kind_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.topic_id, count(*) comment_num FROM `comment` c GROUP BY c.topic_id ) commentinfo ON commentinfo.topic_id = t.id WHERE t.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY t.topic_create desc
